name: UEditorProjectAppearanceSettings
doc: Editor project appearance settings. Stored in default config, per-project

bDisplayUnits: Whether to display units on editor properties where the property has units set.
bDisplayUnitsOnComponentTransforms: Whether to display units on component transform properties
DistanceUnits: Choose a set of units in which to display distance/length values.
MassUnits: Choose a set of units in which to display masses.
TimeUnits: Choose the units in which to display time.
AngleUnits: Choose the units in which to display angles.
SpeedUnits: Choose the units in which to display speeds and velocities.
AngularSpeedUnits: Choose the units in which to display angular speeds.
AccelerationUnits: Choose the units in which to display acceleration.
TemperatureUnits: Choose the units in which to display temperatures.
ForceUnits: Choose the units in which to display forces.
TorqueUnits: Choose the units in which to display torques.
ImpulseUnits: Choose the units in which to display impulses.
PositionalImpulseUnits: Choose the units in which to display positional impulses.
ShowSearchableNames: Should the Reference Viewer have 'Show Searchable Names' checked by default when opened in this project
ReferenceViewerDefaultMaxSearchBreadth: The default maximum search breadth for the reference viewer when opened
